remarks: The orthocomplement of a co-atom is an atom not under it.  Provides a convenient construction when we need the existence of any object with this property.  (Contributed by NM, 25-May-2012.)
statement:
lhpocnel.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpocnel.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
lhpocnel.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpocnel.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpocnel $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( ( ._|_ ` W ) e. A /\ -. ( ._|_ ` W ) .<_ W ) ) $.
